power.title: Conductive Defense
power.fluff: Your attack surrounds a foe with a shroud of crackling lightning, threatening retribution for strikes against your allies

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Constitution modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, the target takes lightning damage whenever it hits one of your allies, after the hit has been resolved. The the lightning damage equals your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus, of half this amount if it is not marked by you.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, the target takes lightning damage whenever it hits one of your allies, after the hit has been resolved, or whenever it shifts to a square adjacent to one of your allies, maximum of once per movement. The lightning damage equals your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus, or half this amount if it is not marked by you.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, the target takes lightning damage whenever it hits or misses one of your allies, after the hit or miss has been resolved. The lightning damage equals your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Demon Dance
power.fluff: As you slash your enemy, you implant the image of howling demons into its mind, distracting the foe from making attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -5 penalty to triggered attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to triggered attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is distracted by images of demons until the end of your next turn.
While distracted, the target takes a -5 penalty to triggered attack rolls and loses any Threatening Reach it might have.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and the target is distracted by images of demons until the end of your next turn.
While distracted, the target target is unable to make opportunity attacks and takes a -5 penalty to other triggered attack rolls.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls with opportunity attacks and a -2 penalty to other triggered attack rolls. These penalties last until the end of your next turn.

power.fluff: By the power of your mind, you shrug off effects that would keep you away from your foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You are no longer marked or slowed.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you cannot be marked or slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:

section.name: Hit:

power.title: Twisted Eye
power.fluff: You flood the mind of your foe with psionic energy, befuddling its vision and distorting its perception of nearby threats and, by increasing the flood to a torrent, you can blind the foe completely

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Constitution vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Consitution modifier damage.
Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to the number of your allies adjacent to it. The penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power unaugmented as a melee basic attack.
If you use the power in this way outside of your own turn, the penalty to attack rolls only lasts until the end of the acting creature's turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this augmented version in place of a melee basic attack when making an opportunity attack.
If you do, the penalty to attack rolls lasts until the start of the acting creature's next turn.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

section.text: Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus psychic damage, and you mark the target and one enemy adjacent to it until the end of your next turn.
If you only target one creature with this power, the damage is 1[W] + Constitution modifier instead.
